# Software

[**MLbalance:**](https://github.com/CetiAlphaFive/MLbalance) Implements a machine learning balance test, the balance permutation test, for experimental data. This test is designed to detect failures of random assignment, simple imbalance across treatment arms, or attrition in panel experimental data. Associated working paper is Rametta and Fuller (2023).

# Non-Academic Writing

Prior to graduate school, I worked in the public policy space. Over the course of several years as a policy analyst, I authored and coauthored a variety of works on a wide variety of federal policy topics. Mainly, my work focused on the federal budget, social insurance, public finance, and the federal debt limit. Some publications from this period are listed below.
